api_list.api_description: Estimate the age of a person based on their first name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The first name of the person to estimate the age for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to improve estimation accuracy.

query: How old is someone likely to be if their name is Michael?
